restaurant noun /ˈres.trɒnt/ /-tə.rɑːnt/ n [ C ] Definition a place where meals are prepared and served to customers (Definition of restaurant noun from the Cambridge Advanced Learner's Dictionary&Thesaurus ©Cambridge University Press) + Free Dictionary Toolbar for Browsers + Add Dictionary Search to iGoogle and your website
